description: The car that broke the internet before the internet existed. The Mk4 Supra's 2JZ-GTE is an iron-block monument to overengineering — Toyota built it to handle 1000 horsepower on stock internals, and the tuning community took that as a personal challenge.
lore: The 2JZ doesn't care about your power goals. It'll do whatever you ask. Four-digit horsepower on stock internals isn't a myth — it's a Tuesday for a good tuner with a Supra in the bay.
